Text: Thanks for the attempt at uploading this.  When I download it, and try to open with my e-reader, it tells me there is an error with the book.  The first book, "Gabriel's Inferno" was fine.

I have tested with Calibre, Adobe digital editions and Kindle, it is working with them all.
which e-reader are you using.

Kobo Vox.  Gabriel's inferno downloaded and fine and it played on it.  I even tried deleting and downloading again, just in case there was an error, but the same thing happens.  Its the e-pub version I have to use for the Kobo.  Thanks.
